name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience building and deploying high-performance applications leveraging **C#**, **.NET**, **.NET Core**, **ASP.NET Web API**, and **Entity Framework**. Proficient in **Vue.js**, **TypeScript**, and **RESTful APIs**, alongside a robust understanding of **PostgreSQL** and **MSSQL** databases. Skilled in orchestrating cloud-native systems on **Azure**, **AWS**, and **GCP**, utilizing **CI/CD** practices, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes** for streamlined development processes.

Extensive experience in microservices architecture and developing event-driven applications using **RabbitMQ**, **Kafka**, and **Azure Service Bus**. Well-versed in automated testing frameworks, applying **unit testing** and **integration testing** methodologies alongside **TDD** and **BDD** principles, ensuring code quality and security best practices.

Hands-on expertise in leveraging **Python** and delivering AI/ML-powered platforms that support predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing. Committed to collaboration within agile development environments and experienced in pair programming, contributing to innovative solution delivery while aligning with compliance standards.
